rows.label: tlk41700122_03_msg0001
rows.name:
I hear the Imperial Army
caught the vicious bandits
who attacked Iraada Village...

rows.label: tlk41700122_03_msg0002
rows.name: It seems we'll have peace for a while.

rows.label: tlk41700122_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Still, I feel sorry for the
people of Iraada Village.

rows.label: tlk41700122_03_msg0004
rows.name:
The Moonbeam Bananas from there
were so juicy and delicious.

rows.label: tlk41700122_03_msg0005
rows.name:
Oh, right, that boy Otto was talking
about was from there, wasn't he?

rows.label: tlk41700122_03_msg0006
rows.name:
Apparently he got into a bit
of trouble, but now he's
working in Avaritia, I hear.

rows.label: tlk41700122_03_msg0007
rows.name:
I hope he can sort out his feelings
and grow up to be a good man.
